website_summaries.verdict: If you need a bigger pack that is still very lightweight, this model is a strong choice.
pros: Can hold snacks and other personal items
Adjusts well for a good fit
If you need to carry a lot while you run, or need a place to stash your layers, this is a good choice
cons: This model does not have the bottom strap for extra hold during a run

customer_reviews.title: Great day pack for hiking or biking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a day hike, loved it so much I bought 3 more for the kids. It's small enough that it's unobtrusive when hiking or biking. But big enough for wallet, keys, a small lunch, and obviously already contains the water bladder. I'm 6'3" 220 and kids are 9 and 10, and this is a good size for all of us... On the trail it's nice that we each have our own water and snacks, instead of 1 big hunky pack and everyone asking for their water bottle or stuff. Makes for a more pleasant family hike. I think it's perfect size for a day hike. Just enough room, not cumbersome, fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and two other packs to take rim to rim across the Grand Canyon. Awesome pack! it is lightweight and sturdy. The material is thin so I was a bit nervous but it held up great. The water hydration system is a good one too. We filled the pack with about 5 bottles of water/gatorade, food, clothes, sunblock, first aid kit, and various other essentials. We used it in Yosemite, Death Valley, and the Grand Canyon for long hikes. This is a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: B. Mein.

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this back pack it excellent! 😄 It is light weight and a great ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this back pack it excellent! 😄 It is light weight and a great fit for my children. There are built in coolers to keep stuff cool and pockets on the side to hold water bottles and other drinks. I would definitely recommend it for any age group and especially people who enjoy outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: my favorite backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Hiked all over the desert w/ this bag! The size is perfect. I could fit a light jacket and pair of shoes in the second pouch. The hydration system is really good quality as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is better than expected. The OD Green is better than shown in the photo and not so green, but a nice dark OD green the way OD should be. The push button hose release is nice. The pack has 3 pockets: 2 small, 1 large, plus the pocket for the water bladder (4 total), and an area that's easy to strap something in. It's definitely large enough to carry a light change of clothes, first aid kit, lunch, knife, gun, flashlight, etc. The only cons is it doesn't come in FDE, and my back was soaked after a 3 hour hike (not from a leak, but from sweat).
customer_reviews.author: Whomever

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was 18 weeks pregnant when my significant other and I went to a rock festival in July in WI. Average temp for all 4 days we were there was 95°f with humidity in the 80%. I kept a Nordic-ice ice pack in with the water bladder and is was cold all day. The bladder is VERY durable and easy to fill. I would recommend running HOT water through it (bladder, tubing etc..) before the first use but other that it worked great. I drank more than a gallon of water a day with that and it was soooo nice having it right there! I would HIGHLY recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Nice pack
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made or quality materials as a much higher priced pack, but good enough for my ski purposes. Based on other reviews, I'm careful using the zippers so they won't break. Material thin but holding up. Bladder has nice large opening making it easy to fill, empty and clean. Bladder started leaking some. Checked it quickly and couldn't figure where/how it was leaking. Just put bladder in a plastic bag and that deals with that problem.
customer_reviews.author: sweater

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect l has more then enough space to take snacks
customer_reviews.text: Took this for a week long camping , hiking trip. It was perfect l has more then enough space to take snacks , wallet and water . It was super comfortable and all my stuff stayed dry when it unexpectedly rained on us. It stayed clean as we moved threw the woods. I was able to carry shoes with a carabiner . I have to say it super comfortable even with the water weight. I loved the side pockets was super convenient for snacks or tools . I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I looked at all the top brands and finally landed on the Benkii hydration backpack. I gave it a try yesterday on an extended hike and it performed flawlessly. For those looking for such a product I would tell them to give this a try. They will get what they need and save a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: The Doc

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need
customer_reviews.text: This bag is sturdy. I've used it for more than a month already and it has been my company for long bike rides. Just the right size for me for water, extra light clothes, keys, and wallet. My helmet clamps to the front of the bag, which makes it convenient when I carry it with me without needing another hand to hold the helmet. I am pleasantly surprised. Worth every penny that I paid for this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joost Santos

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my son who loves to hike with me but never wanted to wear a backpack, meaning I'd end up carrying everything in my pack except for an occasional reprieve when he would take it for awhile. This backpack is lightweight, comfortable, and has a water-delivery system that fits perfectly, works well, is easy to fill, and doesn't leak. The pockets on the back make it easy to stuff things into and take them out as needed while it's still on his back, like dog leashes and snacks. He likes it and hasn't complained once. Now we share the load. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Blake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Grand Canyon vacation
customer_reviews.text: We bought 5 of these for our family vacation to the Grand Canyon. These are awesome backpacks. They were lifesavers. They hold 2L of water that lasted 1/2 day to a full day. Easy to assemble, easy to drink from. It has plenty of room for other stuff you’ll need. We even packed sandwiches that stayed fresh in the cooler section. We love these backpacks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: Great full service hydration backpack! Lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific item at a terrific price! I had been using an old hydration backpack for years and desperately needed an upgrade. I chose this one because of the multi pockets and storage area. I can now carry more than just a water and chapstick, yet still not be as bulky as a regular backpack. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: vleecollins23

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: I love all the pockets that this has! Sometimes the straw is hard to get water out of and it has a plastic like taste until you wash it a few times. This bag is a little heavier than my previous one But is likely from all the pockets and ability to carry more things. I live in Arizona and this is great for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: They should probably put the bladder in the main pouch to ship, we had a small freak out it was missing. The color is much more vibrant and beautiful than the picture on the website. Well made and very durable. It was accidentally jumped on while full and held up fabulously. Kept ice water cold for almost 6 hours in Southern heat and sun. We are going to purchase a second one for the upcoming sports seasons.
customer_reviews.author: 4dotsofpolka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of storage and a good price. Had an issue with the bladder hut the seller reached out before I had contacted them and i explained the problem. Sent another one right away and works perfectly. Will definitely order again if i need another. More space then what I need it for so that is a big plus. 6 stars if I had the option.
customer_reviews.author: S10e user

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet - but the design and structure of it seems to be really great. I love the size and all the pockets. Most of all love that it is water resistant! If anything changes I will update it when I finally get around to using it. If there is no update than it is fab!
customer_reviews.author: OWO

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a good unit - just concerned about it staying in place as I run
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a good unit - well constructed. Haven't taken it on a run yet (just received after returning home from a business trip). Adjusted the straps for a good fit. The only concern I have is the unit doesn't have a lower strap to ensure it stays in place. This may or may not be a valid concern ... will see after I've taken it on a trial run.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hiking Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a day pack for our backpacking trip to Havasupai last year in October. It was perfect for storing my snacks, sunscreen, phone, chapstick, water pack and microfiber towel. The material is very lightweight. It was comfortable and never bothered me. I now use it when I take my kids to the zoo, hiking or whenever we go for bike rides. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: MommyAz_1

customer_reviews.title: Great bladder.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack so far. It seems durable but Ive only used it once. I froze the bladder the night before and took it out at 7am. We had a 2 hr drive to our destination and we hiked in 95 degree weather until 5pm. The water was shared between my husband and I and literally took the last COLD sip as we were getting in the car to leave.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great for a day hike
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack for a day hike. It is sturdy and the bladder is well constructed and works good! This pack does not hold much though. You can probably fit a lightweight jacket, snacks, and your wallet/phone in it. Maybe one more item. Beyond that you are going to be stuffing things in there. So, perfect for day hike where you don’t need to bring a lot with you.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Miscall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight day pack. Nicely made. Lots of pockets. I bought it to use the hydration bladder to replace one in a running pack. This whole pack was cheaper than buying a separate bladder. This pack is too big for running but will be ideal for a hike.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a day pack while camping and it held up quite well. I didn't use the water pack as much as its extremely hard to dry out so I avoided needing to wash it. There's so many pockets and it can hold quite a bit of things. It was very comfortable carrying around all day as well. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, especially for the price. I was a little worried that this only has a chest strap and not a waist strap, but once you adjust everything it has a very comfortable fit. It sits firmly on your shoulders and upper back, exactly where you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: 2L water bladder and pockets for large water bottles.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pack for Hiking as it has a 2L bladder in an insulated section and room for two large bottles in the side pockets. There is plenty of room for other items in the pack and in the various pockets. It rides nicely high on the back during walking and hiking, have not assessed it for running.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. AL

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag, the bladder not as much
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great. I have not had the first issue yet and I use it 2 or 3 times a week while mountain biking. However one of the 2 bladder securing tabs broke the very first time I used it, which was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Terrific quality and a great value
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has potential to be the best $20 I ever spent. Outstanding quality, and looks great. My hose did freeze solid while snowboarding in Colorado but I doubt that can be avoided, as it was -1 degrees
customer_reviews.author: jman

customer_reviews.title: Excellence at a perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is excellent! The bladder is excellent! The actuator is excellent! The pack itself is excellent! I really really like this the best of any I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: The Good Doctor!Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Insulated Area...keeps liquid cold
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this pack on my hiking trips in Mt Zion, Bryce Canyon, and Grand Canyon. The pack was absolutely worth the money! One of the best features is the insulated area where the bladder inserts....keeps your liquid cold for a long period of time. Also, all of the pockets are so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome nag
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for hiking with my toddler but like it so much it's turned into my everyday bag/diaper bag/gym bag as well. Has a lot of space but not huge and bulky, plenty of pockets. My kids love drinking out of the hydration pack and I don't have to keep track of water bottles anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good hydration pack. Fits well and keeps my liquids cold. I do fill it completely up with ice and keep it in the fridge until I need it though. Haven't used it on a camping trip, but I have used it all day out in the sun on a few acres working in a garden and it held up well. I'll update if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: William Dansby

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is recently getting into hiking and 'survivalist' activities and prep. This is the perfect starter hiking bag for her and her day trips. The tank is easy to fill, doesnt leak, and the bag is lightweight with plenty of room for a few supplies, snacks, etc. All in all a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura James

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hydration pack! The color was darker than I thought it would be. But overall has been a great pack! The water bladder and tube are easy to clean, and I live the cap to cover the mouth piece.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Falzone

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and handy, many uses and still tough
customer_reviews.text: this is a great day pack. lots of pockets and hydration bladder ready (came with a nice one). it is small enough, but can hold a decent amount for its size. got lots of use, but not great in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Great hydration backpack! We already had one but just for water. This one is so much better! It has 3 pockets to store stuff, reflective stripes for night, padding on the shoulder straps and back and mesh holders on both sides for other drinks. It's awesome! You couldn't ask for anything more!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: The perfect camelback/backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect camelback/backpack for anyone. I was impressed with the extra pockets. It will fit all of your extras; first aid kit, shirt, sweatshirt... This is a great backpack for boy/girl scouts.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R

customer_reviews.title: Really nice to travel with
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little backpack. We used them for a recent trip and would fill them up with water for the day. The water dispenser never leaked. The only minor miss is that the tube is clear and the water would get warm from the sun, but it’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperPro

customer_reviews.title: I asked if they could replace the hose because I was happy with the bag and they sent me a brand ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I recieved had s leak in the mouthpiece. I asked if they could replace the hose because I was happy with the bag and they sent me a brand new bag with bladder and hose. The new one is perfect. I'm very pleased with the product and even more impressed by the level of service I recieved!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Bedaw

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased this as a Christmas gift I cannot attest I the attributes. It appears to be well constructed and light weight. The color is what I expected. I’ll update if I learn differently.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great water backpack. We got this to go to Disney and universal studios. Carried for 5 straight days and never got heavy or uncomfortable. Works perfect. Love the nozzle too. Super easy for kids
customer_reviews.author: Mabbott

customer_reviews.title: It’s Been Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter to use on campouts. It’s been great - lots of pockets, good weight distribution, and I like that the nozzle she drinks from is capped so it stays cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: KSMomto2

customer_reviews.title: Product Ok
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Gallon water bag is really convienience for hiking. Bag is in good quality feels like durable material but the capacity is kind of small.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Ciao

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack for good price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, bit of a plastic/rigid feeling to the fabric but this is how you know it is waterproof. Has enough room for a laptop, water bottle, essentials (keys, wallet etc) and fruit. The straps are comfortable. Without a lot of things inside it is light weight and durable. I am yet to take it for a trail run which is what I bought it for but I’m sure it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Hydration Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great Hydration Backpack, easy to use, Comfortable, 4 pockets (3 pockets for storage and organization plus one pocket for the water bladder). Perfect for me !!!
customer_reviews.author: eyal lachovitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, after using its everything I expected and more, Love that’s there is tons of room. Better than my $125 camelback brand to be honest. Looking to get another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: golfguy78

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, lots of pockets for organization
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, lots of pockets for organization, and roomy. On the right hand side where the water tube attaches to the strap as you are wearing it, the clipping rubs the right bicep and can cause irritation when worn for long periods or if you swing your arms when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I will be giving this as a gift, so didn't get to inspect to well. It feels and looks very durable though. Just what I was looking for for gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrena W. Souza

customer_reviews.title: Water bag leaks
customer_reviews.text: The water bag started leaking by the second day of use. Very soft to use. It is lightweight and comfortable, but it is really tough to dry, which makes it hard to clean. Plus, you can't really get past the weekend water bag.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new backpack. Small enough to not be bulky but large enough for snacks and collecting fruit along the trail. Customer service is great. I got one with a faulty mouthpiece that leaked and they sent me a new assembly within days.
customer_reviews.author: L. Berg

customer_reviews.title: A great value.
customer_reviews.text: This hydration/back pack is a lot of bang for the buck. There seems to be way more room than you think you need. I bought it for riding my motorcycle in the desert. So I have room for water, food, tools and rain gear. Like I said, a lot of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Donald P. Tropepe

customer_reviews.title: Small, lightweight, but spacious
customer_reviews.text: I brought this backpack up to go snowboarding for a weekend and it was great. I could easily fit everything I wanted even after filling up the bladder (sandwiches, small items like keys and wallet, even gloves and neck warmer when it got too warm). But it was light enough that it didn't impede my normal activity. Unfortunately when driving back from the mountain our car was broken into and this bag was stolen, after only owning it for one week! It's unfortunate because I really liked this bag, and would recommend to anyone looking for a hydration backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Aviv

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pack, decent insulation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a road trip to some national parks. Pack was comfortable to wear, and straps are adjustable to fit over at least a few layers. I've had it on other camping trips and discovered that the adjustable open cargo space is sufficient for carrying a growler. Great pack at least for light to moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I read numerous reviews before purchasing 2 of these packs for a Palm Desert vacation. My son and I were impressed with the construction, the amount of room and pockets available and with the water bladder and tubing. We did a lot of hiking in hot weather and these packs were great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality.. I received this item and was really happy with this purchase.. I highly recommend it.. i will be ordering it in another color also..
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good price
customer_reviews.text: This pack works well, hasn't leaked, is comfortable and is fairly easy to clean. Has good sized pockets for day trips. Would be nice if it came with a cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: blundergirl565

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pack for my wife before a hiking trip to Arches and Zion National Parks. I picked this one for the features, solid reviews, and low cost...I was not disappointed. We used the pack 8 times in a week. It's very light-weight, has a large water reservoir, is comfortable and fits a lot of gear for a day hike. It's a great pack and a great value. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, Great for the mountains!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, I couldn’t be more pleased. All the compartments, clips, and the water bladder have exceeded my expectations. For the price, I feel like I got an amazing deal. Fits my skiing helmet, goggles + case and MORE. Worth it 100%. The bladder is awesome quality as well!!
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the product for a national parks trip and the bag’s performance exceeded our expectation. It was lightweight and we were able to carry several liters of water.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Bought it, loved it, load it up, and use it everyday... zipper broke, and I'm buying it again
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, loved it, bicycle toured and backpacked Scotland a summer with it, load it up, and use it everyday... zipper broke I'm buying it again
customer_reviews.author: businesschic

customer_reviews.title: hydration bag leaks, otherwise, it looks good
customer_reviews.text: hydration bag leaks water slowly. not expecting this and disappointed. still trying to return but it says that we can return to a Khol's store nearby. not sure why i cannot use FedEx to return. will see but certainly not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I used this to go hiking through Banff National park for a week. it met all my requirements. size was perfect and the water pack never leaked. totally worth the money compared to big brands that offer the same quality at a much higher price. it has alot of different pockets too!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Aines

customer_reviews.title: DON’T use it while skiing
customer_reviews.text: This bag pack is generally okay. The quality is great. However, the water bladder DOES NOT functional AT ALL while skiing. There’s no temperature protection on the plastic water tube and the water in the tube freezes at the really beginning. I have to buy another replacement water bladder with water temperature protection on another website.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Li

customer_reviews.title: A water back pack worth buying!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this back pack! It’s great for hiking!!!!! I’m totally obsessed and I recommend it! So many compartments!!!! One hell of a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this multiple times over the holidays and love it. It has plenty of room to carry items as well as the hydration pack. I can't say enough about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Russell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my backpack. I got it just in time for the Beale street music Festival in Memphis Tennessee. The hydration bag is full and I’m carrying many different souvenirs, the weight of the backpack is still light for and it’s not weighing my back down. The is the best backpack ever! Thank you guys so much.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for a week long hiking trip in Colorado. I was able to bring many snacks in the smaller pockets. My camera and rain jacket were able to fit in the bigger pocket. No leaks at all and the perfect amount to keep me hydrated!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable hiking pack with water bladder
customer_reviews.text: I wish the padding in the straps was a little more substantial but I have enjoyed using this on several short hikes and trips to the dog park. Bladder seems solid, fairly easy to clean. Good amount of pockets on the pack. Enough for dog bowl, water bottles, snacks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JSPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, and the fact that the water pouch is removable! Leaving me with an insulated reusable bag for grocery shopping trips. Material seems pretty tear resistant and holds up well in weather
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hiking pack that I've ever purchased, and I love it. I used it on a trip to Denver, and it was perfect for the airport and the trails.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Like the camelback. It’s light weight, and bright so the hunters won’t shoot me in the forest.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D. James

customer_reviews.title: Great entry-level daypack
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal value for an entry-level daypack. Perfect for storing layers, snacks and light gear. Bladder works well and is easy to use. Insulated compartment has room for other items and works well. For the money, definitely worth the investment - especially for a novice day hiker.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Picked up a few for the kids to go hiking with and they all love the pack. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Poetically Correct

customer_reviews.title: Great hydration system
customer_reviews.text: Great pack. Used for hiking Big Bend. Plenty of water storage. Good room for other items for day hiking
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good bladder. Good storage. Vibrant colors. Was a gift and they liked it.
customer_reviews.author: ZenKenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Back Pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack especially for the price. Has lots of space for additional items. Fits well and stylish. I use the hydrator for long hikes but you can take the hydrator out and use that space for clothing if not hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hydration Pack for Hiking, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Took this on several hikes while out in Oregon, and it was perfect for carrying everything I needed while keeping my water relatively chilled throughout thanks to the insulated liner where the bladder is stored. Straps were easily adjustable to fit comfortably, and the assortment of pockets and compartments kept me organized and sane.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Krause

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using!
customer_reviews.text: Color and size was as expected. Appears durable and easy to use. I look forward to using it this summer both cycling and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzlynn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for when he’s riding in the desert. He loves it, says it has lots of pockets and he barely notices he’s even wearing anything on his back when he’s riding. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this water backpack. It looks really nice and has a little side pockets on the sides to carry and play your Bluetooth speakers while you ride!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: which i dont think its easy to cut thru
customer_reviews.text: The backpack itself is made with high quality fabrics, which i dont think its easy to cut thru. Multiple compartments makes me have easy access to my items. I like how i has the tummy buckle.
customer_reviews.author: You

customer_reviews.title: good backpack for a day hike
customer_reviews.text: not big enough for anything more than a day hike, but stores the essentials!
customer_reviews.author: Emma.

customer_reviews.title: Good hiker
customer_reviews.text: So far so good it fits my 6 year old and off to hiking camp he goes. He enjoys that the mouthpiece has a cover to keep the dirt off. Lots of extra room and pockets.
customer_reviews.author: J Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Great travel backpack
customer_reviews.text: Amazing backpack for a week long trip in Costa Rica. Lots of pockets. Light weight. Comfortable. Convenient. Loved the easy access of having water on me to drink all day long without using a disposable water bottle. Great purchase. Can’t wait to use in my next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself. Was so impressed I bought one for my wife. High quality at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: cda customer

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working just now. It says that it is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Yukio

customer_reviews.title: Value & quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dirt bike rider and finding a hydration pack that's quality and won't break the the bank is what I'm interested in not name brand garbage that don't last I will be putting this pack thru the ringer and so for it is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leendertsen

customer_reviews.title: Great pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to Utah. Pack performed flawlessly the entire trip.
customer_reviews.author: sonej4

customer_reviews.title: Light weight backpack
customer_reviews.text: Went on a 4 hour bike ride with this backpack. With all its compartments, it held everything I needed but yet it was light in weight. I love this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: normab

customer_reviews.title: Great hydration pack for hiking.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for hiking the parks in Utah. Loved them. Easy to fill, use and clean. Held all the items I needed. Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: vly5

customer_reviews.title: Nice hydration backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and less expensive alternative to big brand name version.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenza

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I bought one for my husband as the usual hydration packs are to small for him. This one has an insulated area for the water bag so it stays cool longer. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hydration Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick. Seems well made. The only thing I have a concern with is how to clean it!
customer_reviews.author: Nan Rasor

customer_reviews.title: Stay hydrated easily while hiking!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for hiking. Easy way to tote cold water on the March !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Smith

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for BM 2018. They were perfect for us! They carried just enough water and had plenty of space to store our different goggles and respirators. We fit so much into them and they were still light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Best good surprise of 2019
customer_reviews.text: The quality is obviously not military grade, but the price is way further from that. It is well build, nice materials, really is incredible that cost only around $15.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the hydration bags for my daughter and fiancé for a trip to the Grand Canyon they loved using it the insulation actually kept the water warm when It was 20 or 30° out of the canyon they love the product so I love it because they love it
customer_reviews.author: Chiang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pack for Dirtbiking
customer_reviews.text: I got this pack because it is small and holds a 2L bladder. I did not know it would be so great for weekends riding dirt bikes! It hold the tools I need, liquid and first aid in all the right places. It is light and I hardly know it is there. Looking forward to many more rides this this nice pack.
customer_reviews.author: eric arthur

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: We just went on a hiking trip for a week. My son loved it. It worked well. .
customer_reviews.author: HKD

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased my Benkii hydration backpack. I love the design of it. It is lightweight, not bulky and has great storage pockets. I look forward to getting out and using it fully. I appreciate how easy the bladder is to install or remove when not needed. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: revmikejones

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack !!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with the product. Light weight, durable, has space to carry snacks. If you are looking for a cost effective backpack for hikes where you don't have to carry way too much would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Swaminathan M Sundaram

product_meta.title: Hydration Backpack with 2L Water Bladder - Lightweight Pack for Running Hiking Riding Camping Cycling Climbing Fits Men & Women
product_meta.description:

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars446 ratings
feature_bullets: DAY HIKER'S ESSENTIAL PACK: Light, adjustable, comfortable and great storage--make this pack a terrific companion for all your day-long or overnight outdoor adventures (capacity 18L)
BPA free 2-liter hydration bladder included. Convenient bite valve, large opening for easy filling, cleaning & drying.

COMFORTABLE & RELIABLE: Backpack for men, women, and youth; Low-profile athletic cut with full adjustment fits all frames comfortably. Ventilated mesh padding are applied for the shoulder straps, waist straps and back area to ensure the maximum comfort of the pack
INSULATED BLADDER COMPARTMENT：The insulated bladder compartment keeps your liquid cool or hot for up to 4 hours

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: Every Benkii product is backed up by our 100% money back guarantee and amazing customer service. it's never late to contact us if any problem during usage with this backpack
